REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3610 reute d f BC-VOTRAX-INT'L-<VOTX>-W 03-16 0064

TEXT.TITLE: VOTRAX INT'L <VOTX> WINS FORD <F> UNIT CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Votrax International Inc said it won a contract to sell 150 telephone communications systems to Ford Motor Credit Co, a unit of Ford Motor Co. The contract, under which Ford Motor Credit will buy 150 Votrax Call Director Systems during the next 18 months, is a multi-million dlr agreement, the company said. Reuter
